title: Standard Chartered allowed to facilitate Yuan clearing, settlement
snippet:
The central bank on Tuesday allowed Standard Chartered Bank (SCB) Pakistan to set up Yuan clearing and settlement mechanism in the country to improve trade transactions in the Chinese currency with its third biggest trading partner.

The State Bank of Pakistan (SBP) allowed Standard Chartered Bank (SCB) Pakistan Limited to establish their Yuan clearing and settlement setup in Pakistan.
body: 'The expansion of local CNY (Chinese Yuan) clearing and settlement setup in Pakistan is expected to further improve efficiency of the local banking system in transacting in CNY, enhance market liquidity and facilitate rising trade and investment with China through fostering competition and increasing CNY resource avenues,' the SBP said in a statement.
